replies.message: Hi there, Sandra. You can access Safety Check by going to the Safety Check site here: https://www.facebook.com/about/safetycheck/. You can also find more information about Safety Check in our Help Center at: http://on.fb.me/1wm6VFE. We hope that helps! -Rose
That brings up the page but no download or anything.

Hey Barbara. You can access Safety Check by going to the Safety Check site here: https://www.facebook.com/about/safetycheck/. You can also find more information about Safety Check in our Help Center at: http://on.fb.me/1wm6VFE. -Chantal
On an Android browser there are no active links on the about safetycheck link you posted above.
Still can't find a way to download it.   Does it not work on cell phones?   This is all I have.
Just like everyone else,  can't find out how to download it  !!!!
Can't find the spot to download safety check.
I don't think u have to do anything..I believe from what I've been reading that it will just automatically activate if u are in an affected area:)
Hey friends, it's not a download it's just built into Facebook now.
Do you have to turn it on somewhere? There is simply not enough information. Do we already have it? Does it work on cell phones? Come on and spill the complete info. Can it locate me if I travel?
Just like Jennifer Bellemare said, "it's not a download it's just built into Facebook now."

kudos to you Facebook. This is a really  helpful app. One question, does the app  automatically send you abandoned  message or do we have to enroll in that feature ? I think it does and no enrollment required but  not sure
Anyone figure out how to download it?
